title: ALaRM: Align Language Models via Hierarchical Rewards Modeling
abstract: arXiv:2403.06754v1 Announce Type: cross  Abstract: We introduce ALaRM, the first framework modeling hierarchical rewards in reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF), which is designed to enhance the alignment of large language models (LLMs) with human preferences. The framework addresses the limitations of current alignment approaches, which often struggle with the inconsistency and sparsity of human supervision signals, by integrating holistic rewards with aspect-specific rewards. This integration enables more precise and consistent guidance of language models towards desired outcomes, particularly in complex and open text generation tasks. By employing a methodology that filters and combines multiple rewards based on their consistency, the framework provides a reliable mechanism for improving model alignment. translated_title: ALaRM: 通过分层奖励建模对齐语言模型
translated_abstract: 我们介绍了ALaRM，第一个在强化学习中从人类反馈模型分层奖励的框架，旨在增强大型语言模型（LLMs）与人类偏好的对齐性。该框架解决了当前对齐方法的限制，这些方法通常难以处理人类监督信号的不一致性和稀疏性，通过将整体奖励与特定方面的奖励相结合。这种整合使得语言模型更加精确和一致地指导朝着期望的结果前进，尤其在复杂和开放的文本生成任务中。通过应用基于一致性的方法来过滤和组合多个奖励，该框架提供了一种可靠的机制来改善模型的对齐性。我们通过在长篇问题回答和机器翻译任务中使用gpt-3.5-turbo进行成对比较来验证我们的方法。
tldr: ALaRM是第一个从人类反馈中建模分层奖励的框架，通过整合整体奖励与特定方面的奖励，改善了大型语言模型与人类偏好的对齐性，尤其在复杂文本生成任务中表现出更精确和一致的指导。
en_tdlr: ALaRM is the first framework modeling hierarchical rewards from human feedback in reinforcement learning, aiming to enhance the alignment of large language models with human preferences. By integrating holistic rewards with aspect-specific rewards, it improves the alignment of language models with human preferences, particularly showing more precise and consistent guidance in complex text generation tasks.
